message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm offering it to you for $125. Let me know what you think!
Hey Alice, $125 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $105 right now. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. $105 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $115. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
